title: Lower Forms Nail Extension Course
subtitle: A complete practical guide to working with lower nail forms - from preparation to architecture and 3D designs
master_about: Professional nail artist and educator with five years of experience in the nail industry. Author of the Lower Forms Extension Course, helping artists master modern techniques, create perfect architecture, and work confidently with clients. She believes every nail is a small piece of art.
bonus_desc: How to sell your service to a client? Pricing strategy.

lessons.name: How to choose and order lower forms
What is architecture and how it should be
Gel application and filing of stiletto shape
